title: Queen of the Kingdom (RPG/Adventure Music)
description: Queen of the Kingdom is an Orchestral RPG soundtrack suited for any game with a sense of adventure, excitement and heroism!
longDescription:
Queen of the kingdom features 16 tracks that can be used as main themes, combat cues or location cues. Each track features 2-3 different LOOPABLE sections that can be used in a variety of scenes or locations.


Every track has the bpm listed in the title so that you can easily create loops from each. If you prefer to let each track play completely, that’s fine too!


All audio files are stereo, 48kHZ, 24bit. This download includes a WAV version of each track


A trailer featuring complete listen-only the pack can be found here:

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=u4Mi_N04SSQ
